labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Nothing, it doesn't update as if you haven't given them a role. Until you right click on them, then it appears
data.expected_result: It supposed to instantly update name color and the roles column
data.short_description: When giving a server member a role from server settings from the plus icon, it doesn't update their name color and the role column
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings - Go to members - Try to assign a role by using the plus button, not the right click menu
